text:
One of the best places to shop if you're looking for great deals. It's an outlet mall, so you can find discounts of up to 80% on big brands like Nike, Adidas, and Coach. The selection is pretty solid, from fashion to homeware, so there’s something for everyone.

The mall is spacious, and it’s easy to navigate with all the stores grouped by category. There are plenty of food options too, whether you're in the mood for local food or something more international, so you can grab a bite while shopping.

It’s a 5-minute walk from Jurong East MRT, so it’s super convenient to get to. Weekdays are best if you want to avoid the crowd, but even on weekends, it’s still pretty manageable.

If you're looking for a spot to shop and save, IMM is definitely worth checking out.

Highly recommend to visit the Under Armour store at IMM. They got the best staff there, super friendly and genuine. They helped me snag the best deals in bulk too! Surprisingly, the more I bought, the cheaper it was :) thank you so much for the good service and also the quality apparels and shoes.

Singapore’s largest outlet mall located at Jurong east. There are Stores for sports, cosmetics, furniture, travel, fashion, jewelry, toys, etc. Nike, Adidas, Puma, New Balance, Under Armour just to name a few. My Grab driver told me there are great bargains, but I did not find that to be the case. Sales are varied from store to store. There are plenty of places to eat too

I was served by Ms. Ivy from Owndays Optical Shop, and I was truly impressed by her expertise, professionalism, and warm demeanor. She was incredibly patient and meticulous in adjusting both my spectacles and sunglasses, ensuring they fit me comfortably. Thanks to her skillful adjustments, I can now wear them with ease.

I will definitely visit the shop again whenever I need optical services.

IMM Building houses numerous optical shops, making the competition fierce. However, exceptional service like Ms. Ivy’s truly makes a difference. Her dedication and attention to detail set Owndays apart, making it a standout choice for quality eyewear and customer care.

This shopping mall features factory outlets from many well-known brands, making it a great spot for bargain hunters. There are also plenty of restaurants and food options to choose from, so you can easily spend a few hours here. If you’re visiting Singapore and looking to shop for branded items at discounted prices, this place is definitely worth a visit.
